title: Very Weird Store Sales ???

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
So I went in the shop to get a champion, and found some champions on sale. That wasn't the weird part... The first thing I noticed was that they were listed with 50% BLUE ESSENCE as well as RP. I have never seen a sale like this???

There are 23 champions on this sale (I only have 18 shown in the pictures since I deselected *Show Owned*).

And weirdly enough, 21 out of these 23 are listed with 50% BE and RP, whereas Nami and Wukong are only listed with 50% RP (and normal BE).

Could anyone explain this?

replies.body:
Nami, Wukong etc are part of the normal sale rotation (RP only), the other champs are part of a special start of season sale that is BE as well.

It runs until Jan 25th (but remember to allow for time zones).

Why you not got Janna?
